programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 7235466, Title: 9-1-1, --- Description: 9-1-1: Created by Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear, Ryan Murphy. With Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Oliver Stark, Aisha Hinds. Explores the high-pressure experiences of the first responders who are thrust into the most frightening, shocking and heart-stopping situations." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7235466/","name":"9-1-1","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNiMmNmZWQtMTJlMS00NWIyLTlhNmEtNmI3M2Q1YjczMGI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjEwNTM2Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Explores the high-pressure experiences of the first responders who are thrust into the most frightening, shocking and heart-stopping situations.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7235466/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"couponschick91","dateCreated":"2021-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Please never cancel!","reviewBody":"I love this show. The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0108757/","name":"ER","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWQ0YTQ1ZmQtNzk1NC00NzMzLWJjNDYtMDQ0MTcxMThhYTI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0108757/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"julia_rakowski"},"dateCreated":"2004-03-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The life and times of doctors at Cook County General Hospital, Chicago.","reviewBody":"The best medical drama ever to be aired! It's fast paced, emotional, and suspenseful. The cast is unbeatable. Composed of some of the best actors and actresses Hollywood has ever seen including George Clooney. The show is extremely realistic down to the smallest detail, yet easy enough to understand. There is a lot of drama, but also some comic relief. The characters are all unique and different, but they work well together on stage. The plots and sub-plots are very diversified, but they all tie in somehow. The writing and coordination is incredible. I would recommend this show to everyone, it sure is a change from the warm fuzzies of television!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54644,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1994-09-19","keywords":"emergency room,sleeping,medical care,medical doctor,ensemble cast","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000381/","name":"Anthony Edwards"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000523/","name":"Julianna Margulies"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093758/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037310/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000341/","name":"Michael Crichton"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Er: Season 15","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2463087897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1YmVhZjEtZmFlMC00NGNiLWIyODgtNjBjNTc2ZTZmNjE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1YmVhZjEtZmFlMC00NGNiLWIyODgtNjBjNTc2ZTZmNjE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Er: Season 15"}}</script><metacontent="

The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0108757/","name":"ER","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWQ0YTQ1ZmQtNzk1NC00NzMzLWJjNDYtMDQ0MTcxMThhYTI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0108757/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"julia_rakowski"},"dateCreated":"2004-03-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The life and times of doctors at Cook County General Hospital, Chicago.","reviewBody":"The best medical drama ever to be aired! It's fast paced, emotional, and suspenseful. The cast is unbeatable. Composed of some of the best actors and actresses Hollywood has ever seen including George Clooney. The show is extremely realistic down to the smallest detail, yet easy enough to understand. There is a lot of drama, but also some comic relief. The characters are all unique and different, but they work well together on stage. The plots and sub-plots are very diversified, but they all tie in somehow. The writing and coordination is incredible. I would recommend this show to everyone, it sure is a change from the warm fuzzies of television!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54644,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1994-09-19","keywords":"emergency room,sleeping,medical care,medical doctor,ensemble cast","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000381/","name":"Anthony Edwards"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000523/","name":"Julianna Margulies"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093758/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037310/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000341/","name":"Michael Crichton"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Er: Season 15","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2463087897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1YmVhZjEtZmFlMC00NGNiLWIyODgtNjBjNTc2ZTZmNjE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1YmVhZjEtZmFlMC00NGNiLWIyODgtNjBjNTc2ZTZmNjE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Er: Season 15"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
1-800-Missing: Created by Glenn Davis, William Laurin. With Caterina Scorsone, Vivica A. Fox, Mark Consuelos, Louis Ferreira. Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0373474/","name":"1-800-Missing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNThjNjBiMmQtNTRlMi00YWEyLWJjMmUtOThkYjcxNDNjMTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MTYxMzk2._V1_.jpg","description":"Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0373474/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"marisawenzel"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Retooling and re-casting ruined the show","reviewBody":"1-800-Missing was an imperfect but enjoyable show.

Sadly, in a counter-productive attempt at helping the show, Lifetime ruined it.

They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Vivica Fox ruins every scene she is in on that show. She is devoid of any discernible acting ability and grimaces her way through scenes.

It's hard to imagine why they let an excellent actress like Gloria Reuben go, but to replace her with a bad actress like Ms. Fox shows that the show has now reached its creative death.

Maybe it is now so cheap to do (it does look like amateur hour at the local theater!) that they are still shooting it, but really... is there anyone still watching it?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1302,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2003-08-02","keywords":"fbi federal bureau of investigation,female protagonist,scene before opening credits,law enforcement,vision","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778741/","name":"Caterina Scorsone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000407/","name":"Vivica A. They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Vivica Fox ruins every scene she is in on that show. She is devoid of any discernible acting ability and grimaces her way through scenes.

Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0373474/","name":"1-800-Missing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNThjNjBiMmQtNTRlMi00YWEyLWJjMmUtOThkYjcxNDNjMTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MTYxMzk2._V1_.jpg","description":"Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0373474/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"marisawenzel","dateCreated":"2006-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Retooling and re-casting ruined the show","reviewBody":"1-800-Missing was an imperfect but enjoyable show.

Sadly, in a counter-productive attempt at helping the show, Lifetime ruined it.

They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Vivica Fox ruins every scene she is in on that show. She is devoid of any discernible acting ability and grimaces her way through scenes.

It's hard to imagine why they let an excellent actress like Gloria Reuben go, but to replace her with a bad actress like Ms. Fox shows that the show has now reached its creative death.

Maybe it is now so cheap to do (it does look like amateur hour at the local theater!) that they are still shooting it, but really... is there anyone still watching it?","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1302,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2003-08-02","keywords":"fbi federal bureau of investigation,female protagonist,scene before opening credits,law enforcement,vision","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778741/","name":"Caterina Scorsone","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000407/","name":"Vivica A. programme.title: Nurses
programme.desc: Une opération de chirurgie esthétique prestigieuse pour Saint-Mary pourrait changer la vie d'une petite fille, tant et aussi longtemps que le chirurgien peut terminer l'intervention.

programme.title: Nurses
programme.desc: Après un terrible accident survenu à un concert, St-Mary est placé en code orange. Nos infirmiers vont alors réaliser combien il est important de pouvoir compter les uns sur les autres.

programme.title: Nurses
programme.desc: Des fantômes du passé rendent la journée à Saint-Mary particulièrement pénible pour nos infirmiers alors qu'ils sont chacun confrontés à des gens ou des événements qu'ils ont essayé de laisser derrière eux.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: A Londres, Nicholas Angel, de très loin le meilleur policier de son unité, a réussi au fil des années à attirer l'hostilité de tous ses collègues, qui jalousent ses résultats et détestent son insupportable arrogance. Du coup, le voilà muté par sa hiérarchie à la campagne, plus précisément à Sandford, bourgade sans histoires où il ne se passe absolument rien. Le taux de de criminalité y en est en effet le plus faible du pays. Traînant comme un boulet son nouvel équipier, le benêt Danny Butterman, Nicholas s'ennuie ferme. Mais une série d'accidents pour le moins suspects va bientôt le remettre en selle.

programme.desc: ER: Created by Michael Crichton. With Noah Wyle, Laura Innes, Laura Cerón, Deezer D. The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0108757/","name":"ER","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWQ0YTQ1ZmQtNzk1NC00NzMzLWJjNDYtMDQ0MTcxMThhYTI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0108757/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"julia_rakowski"},"dateCreated":"2004-03-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The life and times of doctors at Cook County General Hospital, Chicago.","reviewBody":"The best medical drama ever to be aired! It's fast paced, emotional, and suspenseful. The cast is unbeatable. Composed of some of the best actors and actresses Hollywood has ever seen including George Clooney. The show is extremely realistic down to the smallest detail, yet easy enough to understand. There is a lot of drama, but also some comic relief. The characters are all unique and different, but they work well together on stage. The plots and sub-plots are very diversified, but they all tie in somehow. The writing and coordination is incredible. I would recommend this show to everyone, it sure is a change from the warm fuzzies of television!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54644,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1994-09-19","keywords":"emergency room,sleeping,medical care,medical doctor,ensemble cast","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000381/","name":"Anthony Edwards"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000523/","name":"Julianna Margulies"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093758/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037310/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000341/","name":"Michael Crichton"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Er: Season 15","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2463087897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1YmVhZjEtZmFlMC00NGNiLWIyODgtNjBjNTc2ZTZmNjE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1YmVhZjEtZmFlMC00NGNiLWIyODgtNjBjNTc2ZTZmNjE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Er: Season 15"}}</script><metacontent="

Missing: Disparus sans laisser de traces
programme.sub-title: S3 E4 La peur au ventre
programme.desc:
1-800-Missing: Created by Glenn Davis, William Laurin. With Caterina Scorsone, Vivica A. Fox, Mark Consuelos, Louis Ferreira. Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0373474/","name":"1-800-Missing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNThjNjBiMmQtNTRlMi00YWEyLWJjMmUtOThkYjcxNDNjMTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MTYxMzk2._V1_.jpg","description":"Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0373474/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"marisawenzel"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Retooling and re-casting ruined the show","reviewBody":"1-800-Missing was an imperfect but enjoyable show.

Sadly, in a counter-productive attempt at helping the show, Lifetime ruined it.

They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Vivica Fox ruins every scene she is in on that show. She is devoid of any discernible acting ability and grimaces her way through scenes.

It's hard to imagine why they let an excellent actress like Gloria Reuben go, but to replace her with a bad actress like Ms. Fox shows that the show has now reached its creative death.

Maybe it is now so cheap to do (it does look like amateur hour at the local theater!) that they are still shooting it, but really... is there anyone still watching it?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1302,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2003-08-02","keywords":"fbi federal bureau of investigation,female protagonist,scene before opening credits,law enforcement,vision","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778741/","name":"Caterina Scorsone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000407/","name":"Vivica A. Fox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176175/","name":"Mark Consuelos"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070328/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0188462/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147955/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0204657/","name":"Glenn Davis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491462/","name":"William Laurin"}]}</script><metacontent="

Sadly, in a counter-productive attempt at helping the show, Lifetime ruined it.

They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0373474/","name":"1-800-Missing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNThjNjBiMmQtNTRlMi00YWEyLWJjMmUtOThkYjcxNDNjMTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MTYxMzk2._V1_.jpg","description":"Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0373474/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"marisawenzel"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Retooling and re-casting ruined the show","reviewBody":"1-800-Missing was an imperfect but enjoyable show.

Sadly, in a counter-productive attempt at helping the show, Lifetime ruined it.

They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Vivica Fox ruins every scene she is in on that show. She is devoid of any discernible acting ability and grimaces her way through scenes.

It's hard to imagine why they let an excellent actress like Gloria Reuben go, but to replace her with a bad actress like Ms. Fox shows that the show has now reached its creative death.

Maybe it is now so cheap to do (it does look like amateur hour at the local theater!) that they are still shooting it, but really... is there anyone still watching it?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1302,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2003-08-02","keywords":"fbi federal bureau of investigation,female protagonist,scene before opening credits,law enforcement,vision","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778741/","name":"Caterina Scorsone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000407/","name":"Vivica A.
